comments.author: welcomebrand
comments.message:
Congrats, this can only be a good thing for the web :)

J.

comments.author: Chris Love
comments.message: This is awesome, I and the other User Agents eagerly await our formal introductions!

comments.author: JonFMoss
comments.message: They're fortunate to have you on board. I look forward to being convinced.

comments.author: Steve Chovanec
comments.message: Very cool, best of luck at Microsoft. Are you going to be working remotely like Scott Hanselman does?

comments.author: lydiamann
comments.message: fantastic! this is great news for all of us, but particularly for you and Kelly. Congratulations to you both for fighting the good fight and living the life you want. You inspire me.

comments.author: zeldman
comments.message: You and Kelly are wonderful people. You deserve to be happy. You've earned some stability and financial security. I have no doubt that you will continue to make meaningful and important contributions to the standards awareness of our community, the reasonableness and utility of web standards, and the standards compliance and interoperability of IE and other products. Congratulations and thank you for sharing. I send you a great big virtual hug, which I hope to turn into a real one soon! :)

replies.author: Aaron Gustafson
replies.message: You are too kind Jeffrey. Letâ€™s talk (and hug) soon!
